title: ICE E0431.rs with -Zsave-analysis

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-save-analysis
labels.description: Area: saving results of analyses such as inference and borrowck results to a file.

body:
### Code code from `./src/test/ui/error-codes/E0431.rs` ```Rust use {self}; //~ ERROR E0431 fn main () { } ``` ### Meta repo is @ 219380d840877de97b0e17674be7212ebc929d51 ### Error output `build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/bin/rustc ./src/test/ui/error-codes/E0431.rs -Zsave-analysis` ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index 18446744073709551615 out of range for slice of length 0', src/librustc_save_analysis/dump_visitor.rs:213:21 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. ```
Backtrace

``` error[E0431]: `self` import can only appear in an import list with a non-empty prefix --> ./src/test/ui/error-codes/E0431.rs:1:6 | 1 | use {self}; //~ ERROR E0431 | ^^^^ can only appear in an import list with a non-empty prefix warning: unused import: `self` --> ./src/test/ui/error-codes/E0431.rs:1:6 | 1 | use {self}; //~ ERROR E0431 | ^^^^ | = note: `#[warn(unused_imports)]` on by default thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index 18446744073709551615 out of range for slice of length 0', src/librustc_save_analysis/dump_visitor.rs:213:21 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f4ba27b0d57 - ::fmt::he2fbf5405bd3f46a 1: 0x7f4ba27fda3d - core::fmt::write::h65255e7874586eb2 2: 0x7f4ba2781b95 - std::io::Write::write_fmt::h3c49d63e356d89fe 3: 0x7f4ba278d980 - std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}::h6b88f05100c9e449 4: 0x7f4ba278d694 - std::panicking::default_hook::h57a663a807afe943 5: 0x7f4ba41458a3 - rustc_driver::report_ice::h34c4499908ba0b29 6: 0x7f4ba278e06c - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::haef04471b94d420c 7: 0x7f4ba278dc3b - rust_begin_unwind 8: 0x7f4ba27fb7e1 - core::panicking::panic_fmt::h95ae6ee01add471a 9: 0x7f4ba27f9f12 - core::slice::slice_index_len_fail::h0017b5f53e111206 10: 0x7f4ba424f418 - rustc_save_analysis::dump_visitor::DumpVisitor::process_path::h64d45cc6b7fee451 11: 0x7f4ba4251011 - rustc_save_analysis::dump_visitor::DumpVisitor::process_crate::h3af551472fa9ad7e 12: 0x7f4ba4120f98 - rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps::h230cde404218eeb4 13: 0x7f4ba41be03e - rustc_session::utils::::time::ha57d20269542213a 14: 0x7f4ba41318eb - rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::enter_global::h5e4aceeb2c5d9074 15: 0x7f4ba41538e7 - rustc_interface::queries::::enter::h46a369817e38d2d4 16: 0x7f4ba41bd7ca - rustc_span::with_source_map::ha1e1d15982d868c1 17: 0x7f4ba4155b49 - rustc_interface::interface::run_compiler_in_existing_thread_pool::hfd5622ef3ce026be 18: 0x7f4ba412f34e - scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set::hd3c1397285b10bd3 19: 0x7f4ba4156576 - std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::h3df4554cf04b61c9 20: 0x7f4ba412317e - core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once{{vtable.shim}}::hb0a109416f61afc2 21: 0x7f4ba2795d7a - std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start::hb2effada6f868308 22: 0x7f4ba24bc422 - start_thread 23: 0x7f4ba25dabf3 - __GI___clone 24: 0x0 - error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports note: rustc 1.45.0-dev running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -Z save-analysis query stack during panic: end of query stack error: aborting due to previous error; 1 warning emitted For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0431`. ```
